rooms.name: Single room
rooms.description:
All single rooms are modern equipped and adapted for the needs of the most demanding guests. The rooms have a single bed with ergonomic and anti-allergy mattress. Good natural illumination, sound insulation, as well as views of the park will make the guest stay pleasant and comfortable.

Room size: 18m2

Content of the room:

- Free Wi-Fi Internet

- LED TV with satellite and local channels

- Silent  mini bar

- Direct telephone line

- Working desk

- Hairdryer

- "Be Eco" cosmetic set with natural ingredients

- Electronic safe

- Air conditioning with individual settings

- Soundproof windows and doors

- coffee machine

 

* Daily room cleaning service and changing towels. Bed linen is changed every three days.
facilities: - LED TV with satellite and local channels
- "Be Eco" cosmetic set with natural ingredients

rooms.name: Superior double room
rooms.description:
All 24 rooms are modern and fully adapted to the needs of the most demanding guests. Rooms have one king-size bed with possibility of separation on guest request. Good lighting, soundproofing, and a park view, will make guest's stay enjoyable and comfortable.
Room size: 23m2
Room Facilities:
- Free Wi-Fi
- LED TV with satellite and local channels
- Noiseless mini bar
- Direct telephone line
- Office desk
- Hairdryer
- "Be Eco" cosmetic set with natural ingredients
- Electronic safe
- Air conditioning with individual settings
- Soundproof windows and doors
- coffee machine
* Daily cleaning of rooms and changing towels. Bed linen is changed every three days
facilities: - LED TV with satellite and local channels
- "Be Eco" cosmetic set with natural ingredients
